properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is my commandment,
That you love one another,
That your joy may be full.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That your joy may be full,
That your joy may be full.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
This is my commandment,
That you love one another,
That your joy may be full.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
This is my commandment,
That you love one another,
That your peace may be full.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
That your peace may be full,
That your peace may be full.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
This is my commandment,
That you love one another,
That your joy may be full.
